channel.title: About on Sandberg GPR
channel.description: Recent content in About on Sandberg GPR

item.title: About Sandberg
item.description: Sandberg GPR is part of Sandberg LLP, an independent private, professional partnership founded in 1860 providing consultancy and independent professional services.

item.title: Ground Penetrating Radar and how it works
item.description: Ground Penetrating Radar detects changes in the sub-surface. Find out how GPR works, what it can detect, how deep it can penetrate and its advantages.

item.title: Gpr Equipment
item.description: A Ground Penetrating Radar system comprises two main components: a control unit and an antenna. But what are the differences? Which is best?

item.title: Ground Penetrating Radar FAQ
item.description: Find answers to questions we are commonly asked about GPR in our Ground Penetrating Radar FAQ. What is GPR? What can it detect?
